name: Dungeons Demoman
description:
Dungeons Demoman is an arcade game with an varied logic labyrinths. Seeking for adventure you get into a dungeon - you only have your favorite bombs and your superb agile. And that's when all the fun begins!

You'll face a variety of traps, enemies and game mechanics

  • Jump up through a trap-filled maze
  • Explore the levels of a huge and dangerous Dungeon
  • Find and use items to help you on your adventure

Mobile controls: swipe for movement, tap to plant a bomb.

Mouse controls: swipe for movement, tap to plant a bomb

Keyboard controls: arrows for movement, space bar to plant a bomb, C - to enable slow-mo.

Enjoy
